html:
4.18.21  3:12 am   A lot of the time I notice my leg or my head or anything moves in the same way yours does in your music videos along with your music. A good example is the 'and I'm faced with so many changes that I just might change my face' part of 'When I Get Older'. I was moving my head just like that and then looked at the video and you were too. Just interesting to think about, that music has that level of significant communication of feeling so much so that it tells me how to move in the same way. What do you make of that?

      i agree

4.18.21  2:33 am   Is it inappropriate to stay up until 3am?

      not as inappropriate as staying up forever

4.18.21  1:55 am   do you ever wonder what life today would be like if william henry harrison, the 9th united states president, never existed?

      no

4.17.21  11:27 pm   are you a leopard, a camel, a diamond, a baby, a piece of garbage, a stupid idiot, a person, a loser, Steve, Damien Maymdien, or a princess?

      something in between

4.17.21  11:22 pm   what's your daily routine like?

      continue to become more and more awake throughout the day

4.17.21  9:55 pm   Will any of your future videos have awesome psychedelic backgrounds?

      i was thinking of taking a step further and putting awesome psychadelic things in the foreground

4.17.21  9:38 pm   How are you so creative??

      i failed the turing test too many times and now i am trying to get revenge

     When you're making a video for a song, do you plan it all out before?

      i was going to say no but then i realized i write and produce the entire audio song first, so that accounts for every word and sound in the video, which definitely counts as planning

4.17.21  7:26 pm   Do good song ideas tend to come to you when you're consciously trying to have a song idea, or do they kinda sneak up on you?

     sneak up

      If the ladder, is there some common denominator between the times you get surprised? For example in a dream, while taking a shower, immediately after waking, while driving, etc.

     yes, all those times it happens. it happens when i'm not trying. which is sometimes inconvenient, because i really really really really really really really really want it

4.17.21  7:17 pm   why do all my plants keep dying

      because you haven't yet discovered eternal life

4.17.21  5:55 pm   What's your favorite period in history?

      the present

4.17.21  5:43 pm   How do I make my creative juices flow?

      move around

4.17.21  5:37 pm   what do you usually dream about?

      numbers

4.17.21  5:19 pm   Hey Bill, I like that you put yourself in your music videos. Did you randomly do that, or was that something you always wanted to do?

      i randomly selected a person to be in the videos. the fact that it's me is a hugely convenient coincidence

4.17.21  5:04 pm   what you say is the difference between r&b and soul?

      the use of the ampersand

4.17.21  4:52 pm   How would you describe the general mood of the new song?

      dovish

4.17.21  4:06 pm   is the next video mostly 2D for a change?

      yes

4.17.21  3:02 pm   How much you do like ideas?

      this much

4.17.21  2:39 pm   what si the main key of the next song

      F#min

4.17.21  2:06 pm   what should i do

      how about re-inventing the bread crumb.

4.17.21  12:38 pm   how many hours should i practice my instrument

      how many hours do you intend to play it for real

4.17.21  11:33 am   how to english

      start saying 'ya know' a lot

4.17.21  10:22 am   When is the next video gonna come out?

      tomorrow

4.17.21  10:15 am   do animals have nationality? 

      sometimes

4.17.21  8:58 am   What is the 196th word in the next song?

      for

4.17.21  7:15 am   Early in your career, how were you able to manage your time with working a day job and your other responsibilities while still being prolific with your music?

     sometimes it helps to write down exactly how much time you have available, and when that is

     That's my biggest struggle at the moment. I work in a guitar factory, the irony makes me feel as if I'm the punchline of some sort of cosmic joke.

     everyone is. that's how you know the system is working

     Thanks, Bill!

4.17.21  6:03 am   how long should i cook my eggs ?

      1 thousand years

4.17.21  4:56 am   can you sing 

      i will try

4.17.21  4:41 am   do you think?

      that sounds like something i would do

4.17.21  4:30 am   would you consider eating a curtain,

     no

     because i got the fancy ones

4.17.21  2:47 am   Times New Roman or Comic Sans?

      on my screen it's times new roman

4.17.21  2:34 am   what do you do when you have a lot of ideas all at once?

     write down as many as you can

     do you just shut down or does it motivate you even more?

      it motivates me. i like ideas

4.17.21  12:25 am   Will your new video have awesome psychedelic backgrounds?

      no

4.16.21  11:38 pm   Besides jazz, what other music genres do you make

      pop

4.16.21  11:12 pm   I can't get your songs out of my head, what do I do?

      it depends whether you would like to get them out of your head. but, if you want to, you can listen to other songs and that should work

4.16.21  10:13 pm   What gives that groove section in I'm a princess such an awesome feeling to it?

      i might have laced it with some quasi-bassdrums

4.16.21  9:15 pm   What is the point of choosing BPMs like 121,

     if it feels best for the song

     why not just make it 120?

     maybe 120 feels a tiny bit slow sometimes

     Is the difference really that big?

      no, the difference between 120 and 121 is small

4.16.21  6:59 pm   Are you stupid

      yes, and more

4.16.21  6:49 pm   any advice on how to focus on schoolwork

      describe the work to someone else

4.16.21  5:05 pm   how do you feel about people trying to pull deeper meaning from you're songs?

     it all depends on how deep they have pulled the meaning from them previously

     is there even any meaning to it all?

     yes

4.16.21  3:57 pm   what's your opinion on trains?

      i can't fucking believe them

4.16.21  3:03 pm   in i'm a princess, what does the text just visible at about 3:06 (on the back of "wall 590") say? 

      you can probably get a closer look at 2:25

4.16.21  2:27 pm   Cloud guy here, do you prefer sunny days or cloudy days, personally, I like sunny days with some clouds

      i like when the amount of clouds changes each day

4.16.21  1:47 pm   Motivate me, Bill. I'm feelin' oddly down today.

      what would you like to be motivated to do

4.16.21  1:47 pm   How do you feel about other people analyzing your music?

      good

4.16.21  1:39 pm   what are your thoughts about penguins?

      they have knees, that's all i know. sometimes my mind just runs wild with wondering the exact number of knees they could have

4.16.21  1:38 pm   have you considered remaking 'ball and stick' with enhanced 3D balls

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

4.16.21  1:16 pm   what is the origin of mankind?

      mush

4.16.21  1:01 pm   what are some fun ways to exercise 

      walking around the world

4.16.21  12:37 pm   what is your opinion of putting hamburger helper on a hamburger?

      that's the most generous thing i've ever heard of

4.16.21  11:35 am   I want to make art but I don't know how to start

      no one knows that
